One day he hears of a rumor that the evil wizard Kojiro, his father's archenemy, has apparently reared up his ugly head once again! Kojiro's demons invade the land, and threaten death and destruction. "I shall defeat Kojiro!" - says Musashi, - "and maybe even get the girl"...

name: Mutant Colossus from Outer Space
summary: One silent and dark night Ava is driving through the country side just minding her own business. When all of a sudden a meteor shower begins bombarding the surrounding country side, striking here car. After the accident she is struck with new and terrible power. To grow into a Colossal Mutant! Her mind now corrupted by this power, she grows to an enormous size in order to assert her dominance over this world.

name: Mujaffa-Spillet
summary:
Originally released under the name 'Perker-spillet' in Denmark, 'Mujaffa-spillet' is a flash game developed by Danmark Radio, offering a satirical perspective on societal stereotypes. The game places players in the role of Mujaffa, an immigrant cruising through Copenhagen's streets in a stylish BMW to earn 'Street respect points.' The score builds through interactions with blondes, evading the police, and collecting items like gold chains and condoms.

In 2003, Norway's public broadcaster NRK adapted the game to fit the local context, changing the setting to Oslo. Despite initial controversy due to its challenging portrayal of societal taboos, the game continues to provoke discussions about societal preconceptions. While no longer officially available due to the discontinuation of Adobe Flash, 'Mujaffa-spillet' continues to resonate on various online platforms.

name: Multi Race: Match the Car
summary: What should I use today? A tank, or maybe a monster truck? What’s it like outside? Oh, it’s the North Pole. Then a snowmobile will do just fine! That’s basically what our game is all about. It may sound easy but, trust me… It’s not.

name: Mutant Roadkill
summary: Race through an apocalyptic wasteland overrun with mutants and other hazards! Blast your way through city ruins as you try to escape a world overrun with danger. Drive as far as you can and compete against the world on the online leaderboards! Can you make it out alive?

name: Musicology
summary: The player takes the control of an independent record label. They must manage artists and bands.

name: Muppet Monster Adventure
summary: Muppet Monster Adventure is a platform game for the Sony PlayStation developed by Magenta Software and Jim Henson Interactive in 2000, and published by Sony Computer Entertainment in Europe and Midway Home Entertainment in North America.

name: Murdered by Midnight
summary: The Murdered by Midnight board game can now be enjoyed anywhere on the go. Either play with friends or anyone around the world. Be the first to deduce the murderer, murder weapon, motive and time of death to solve the murder and win the game! Not including the detectives, there are 25 people at the manor during the time of the murder, this includes staff, family members and friends. Considering that the person who found the body is not the murderer, there are 22 possible suspects for the crime. With all of the combinations of people, weapons, motives and times, there are more than 483,000 possible outcomes just waiting to be explored!

name: Munches
summary: Food, we need food! Help Tixa get food for her village and find out what happened to the harvest, spreading munches and punches!

name: Music For Everyone
summary: An educational music game that teaches players basics in music theory through lessons and mini games.

name: Mugsy
summary: You play a gang member of a criminal organization in Chicago during the 1930s. But staying a simple gangster is not all your ambition calls for...

name: Mummy contact
summary: Mummy contact is a side-view indirect control platformer that has to guide the mummy through safe paths while avoiding traps.

name: Musicle
summary: Welcome to musicle, the music-guessing daily game. It comes in several flavors - choose yours!

name: Musket Smoke
summary: Flank and charge with friends! Simple, fun and rich with tactical options. Musket Smoke is a turn-based, war game with an unusually interactive UI allowing for enormous tactical options. Smoke, artillery, cavalry charges, morale and flanking. It’s all here and dead simple to play.

name: Muumit meren aalloilla
summary: The second video game in the Moomin franchise. The game is set on a boat and features a number of minigames, ranging from connecting voices to animals to catching flying fishes.

name: Multiplayer Mercs
summary: Multiplayer Mercs - Bad Dudes are attacking the Refinery, it is up to You and Your Elite Force Team to Stop Them !

name: Musketeer of the hell
summary: Save the first person shooting game world

name: Murder on the Zinderneuf
summary:
On board of the dirigible Zinderneuf a murder has taken place and you have only until the airship lands to find the culprit.

Through interrogation (forceful, naive or polite) and finding clues you have to pinpoint the murderer.

High replayability is granted since the murderer and the motive change with every new start of the game.

name: Murder Generation: Cream City Chaos
summary: "Unleash your inner rebel in 'Murder Generation: Cream City Chaos', an 80s-90s arcade-style game set in Milwaukee's punk scene. Fight through 13 levels at iconic venues, aided by lo-fi 8-bit renditions of Murder Generation's music. Battle enemies, assist friends, and claim your punk icon status.

name: M.U.D. Rally
summary: If you are looking for real mobile rally simulation, than you are in the right place. Race at 60 fps in mud, snow, dirt and asphalt in this fast-paced racing game.

name: Musclecar Online
summary: Online indie top-down racing game with a new player-designed racetrack every day. Design your own tracks and race against the ghost recordings of thousands of players around the world. Includes daily and monthly championships, achievements, and leaderboards.

name: Multiplication Flash Cards Games Fun Math Problems
Musapey's Choco Marker
summary: Arcade matching style puzzle game ported to Dreamcast.

name: Murder by Moonlight 2: Crimson Night
summary: Strange murders have shaken the city, the work of a twisted killer who only comes out at night and leaves his victims drained of blood. Help Detective Elliot in this thrilling Match3 Crime Story to solve the mysterious case.

name: Muscle Ranking Vol.1: Ore ga Saikyou no Otoko da!
Muramasa Rebirth: Genroku Legends - Hell's Where the Heart Is
summary: The fourth of the Genroku Legends additional scenarios for Muramasa Rebirth. This add-on follows the story of Rajyaki, the daughter of the Lord of Hell. A former monk named Seikichi accidentally proposes to Rajyaki. Already on a mission to recover the sacred treasures of the Seven Gods of Fortune that she misplaced, Rajyaki stuffs Seikichi in a magical bag and continues her mission, all while being the best fiancée she can be.

name: Multiverse
summary:
Multiverse. Come in and experience our first domain - The Planetarium. Explore astronomy like never before - socially in VR with your friends.

Multiverse is an experience like no other. Learn about astronomy while navigating through awe-inspiring environments that showcase the solar system, its planets, their moons and other solar bodies.

Enter the Planetarium to discover mind-blowing images, videos and models, all rendered in stunning detail, with audio descriptions, toys and interactive exhibits.

Chat, fire off rockets, chase each other through the solar system, or play hide and seek behind Jupiter. Multiverse's focus on streaming and social interactions make this a social experience not to be missed.

name: Mulligans Golf Game
summary: Mulligans Golf Game is an Open Map Arcade Golf Game designed to deliver all the true feelings one gets when playing golf with your friends. The experience has been simplified to allow non golfers to play, but provides depth to challenge those looking for more!

name: Musume
summary:

Another change is elimination of random enemy encounters in favor of enemies visibly roaming the overworld. Characters can now join the protagonist and participate in battles. Battles are viewed from first-person perspective (with large enemy portraits) and feature simple turn-based mechanics.

In this innovative game you will have to move your phone with the music!
Scrolling lights of different shapes and colors will indicate how to move your phone: in front of you, towards you, to the left or to the right, as if you were playing drums.
The 5 motion controls of the game appear progressively and are easy to learn.

name: Musiic Party: Rock the House
summary:
Musiic Party: Rock the House can turn any gathering into a party. A unique comic look combined with a dose of humour guarantees instant fun. In contrast to many other music games, the purchase of additional peripheral devices is not necessary because the entire game is controlled with the Nintendo Wiimote and Nunchuk. Whether bass guitar, lead guitar, or drums - the controls are always simple, comprehensible, and easy to learn so you can quickly and easily rock the night away.

With a total of 30 rock tracks, Musiic Party: Rock the House offers a wide selection of styles within the genre. If you are into rock, Musiic Party will have something for you! The game can be played with up to three players, so you and your friends and family can feel like a real rock band. Several fun mini-games provide additional motivation for a short jam session now and then.

Key Features:
* 30 legendary rock tracks
* Easy to pick up & play
* 3 instruments: bass guitar, lead guitar, and drums
* Exclusively designed for the Wii, using ist innovative control options
* No peripherals required
* Up to three players can jam simultaneously
* Compelling story mode and fun mini-games
* Fresh unique comic-style

It consists of minimal 3D models made of notes and played with native instruments, inspired by the sounds of the 7 different continents.

name: Muksi

Everything is barren and the only thing that you can do is to push the boundaries and figure out where you can really go for yourself. Nothing is impossible here, but trying to reach the end of a level and make it safe home can be very tricky.
Every piece of information, every detail needs to be followed. That will obviously be a challenge, and it’s the type of thing that will push you to the next level. You will appreciate the fact that every level has multiple solutions, so it’s up to your creativity to find the right approach and focus on better understanding and enjoying everything.

name: Multimedia Celebrity Poker
summary:
Heartfelt, but rather unrealistic wishes like ruling the world, unlimited processing power or an evening playing poker with three celebrities usually fall into the sphere of competence of a fairy. In case one happens to show up in your home: don’t ask for that poker game. That’s already been taken care of, thanks to New World Computing. NWC-mastermind Jon Van Caneghem invited three class B TV celebrities of the mid-90s for a day of green-screen filming. The result is called Multimedia Celebrity Poker.

If you’re into TV series, then you’ll probably have no trouble recognizing the faces of your opponents. Sitting at the poker table are Jonathan „Riker“ Frakes (Star Trek: Next Generation), appearing somewhat tight-lipped; talkative comedian Joe Piscopo (Saturday Night Live), showing off his array of impersonations; and aging starlet Morgan Fairchild (Hotel, Falcon Crest), sitting stiff and generally trying not to look too lost. Digitized video clips, seamlessly integrated into the main frame, depict all actions and movements of the stars -- dealing, calling, playing cards. Separate clips for the three actors are played simultaneously to avoid „freezing“ of single persons; all are continuously in motion. The celebrities comment on the their cards and your success to create a relaxed and intimate atmosphere. The number of different statements is quite limited though; prepare to learn those one-liners by heart.

Multimedia Celebrity Poker knows eight different variants of poker. You may play combinations of five cards or seven, stud or draw, lo-ball or high, deuces wild or normal. In any case, it’s always you against the computer; a multiplayer option is not included. In addition to a relaxed round among friends, you can choose to advance levels in a tournament. You win if all opponents are broke, although nobody will undress at that point. Luckily. The program’s poker skill is mediocre; it’s playing fairly straight, rarely risking a bluff. The playing style of the three celebrities does not differ.

Ready to join the game? On second thought, maybe you should wait for the fairy.

name: Mutation of J.B.
summary:
You control a young boy called Johnny Burger who plans to visit his cousin Emanuel for two weeks. As he arrives he finds him gone. A scientist, who's also looking for Johnny's cousin, comes by and offers Johnny 500DM (Deutsche Mark) for an experiment. Of course, the experiment goes awry. During the procedure a mysterious guy flashes the scientist's memory. The emerging irritation causes the professor to start pushing random buttons, which results in Johnny's transformation as a human pig. After Johnny wakes up the professor is gone, too, as he was kidnapped to the Planet Ladea.

So, Johnny's quest comprises of finding the professor to be transformed back into a normal state and finding out what happened to Emanuel.

name: Mujintou Monogatari Memorial Version
summary: A collection of the first three Mujintou Monogatari games for the PC-98.

name: Multi Game Party
summary: Multi Game party is FIRST AN INDEPENDENT GAME, with cartoon graphics online and solo with a huge catalog of various mini games

name: Multi Sports II
summary:
With 'Multi Sports II', Dinamic squeezed everything they could out of their products, getting the ultimate performance at a time when the difficulties were already insurmountable.

For the occasion they had three of the games that had been included in Multi Sports, the previous pack, to which they added the three games from Opera Soft that had the same theme (despite what it may seem, the pack was edited by Dinamic alone)

name: Music Star: Life Simulator
summary: Less than 1% of musicians make it on the path to super stardom! Start at the bottom of the music world and climb the ladder of fame as you create chart topping hits, negotiate record deals and create a musical legacy!

name: Museum of Mechanics: Lockpicking
summary: The Museum of Mechanics: Lockpicking is a browsable, playable collection of lockpicking mechanics from various games. The intended audience is game developers looking to explore the range of lockpicking mechanics that have been implemented in the past.

name: Museum of Artists' Split Minds
summary: Paintings Gallery of Mental Ill Artists

name: Musicus!
summary: Musicus! is a port for the story-rich visual novel Musicus!, that tells a story of the struggle to fit society's mold while living for ourselves.

name: Musical Chairs with Bulldozers and Other Heavy Equipment
Museum Madness
summary: Museum Madness is an educational computer game for the PC (DOS) and Macintosh developed by Novotrade for MECC, and was released in 1994. The game is based in an American natural history museum and aims to teach the player many aspects of history such as technology, geology, space, American history, and prehistory. PC Magazine described the game as having kids learn about educational topics (i.e. ecology) while making logical deductions in a series sequence and solving puzzles.[1]

name: Murders at Tealwoods Manor
summary: You've been invited to a strange party at Lady Tealwoods' new mansion. It's not long until a sudden murder is revealed, and you must piece together who is lying, and who is the murderer as you uncover the secrets of the different strange guests of Tealwoods Manor.

name: Mush
summary: Mush is an interstellar survival game, there is a heavy emphasis on coordination and teamwork between all members on the Human and Mush teams. Survival is accomplished via doing assorted tasks on the ship that will be useful to your teammates. The more survivors you have on your team, the easier it gets!

name: Murder at Homecoming
summary: Murder at Homecoming is the first and only book of the Murder at Homecoming series.

name: MudRunner VR
summary: The Ultimate Off-Road Experience In VR - Face the challenges of harsh weather and terrain in fully immersive VR for the first time! Tackle treacherous mud, fierce rivers, rocky paths, and more, to reach your goals.

name: Mumps
summary: «Mumps» — This is a game about a pig called a Mumps, which should collect all the acorns for itself for the winter. Feel like a pig and survive collecting acorns. Help the pig to pass all levels.

name: Muramasa Rebirth: Genroku Legends - A Cause to Daikon For
summary: The second of the Genroku Legends additional scenarios for Muramasa Rebirth. This add-on follows the story of downtrodden farmer Gonbe, who has taken it upon himself to ask the powers that be to re-think the taxes that are driving his village to the brink of ruin. With the spirit of his deceased wife Otae and some of his fellow farmers by his side, Gonbe sets off to fight for nothing less than the very survival of everyone he knows and cares about.

name: Murphy's Minerals
summary: Murphy's Minerals is a menu-driven, logic based educational game designed to teach players where to find and how to identify different types of minerals.

name: Muv-Luv Integrate
summary: Sequel to Muv-Luv Alternative.

name: Mutations
summary: Originally part of a compilation, Mutations is a clone of Spawn of Evil, where the player, as a patrol unit, must seek and destroy the enemy mutants, cloners, asteroids and battlecars.

name: Munasawagi no Season
summary: Romance drama CD story, with illustrations by Ayumi Hattori. It features interviews with the voice actors and two minigames.

name: Mul.Mash.Tab.Ba.Gal.Gal
summary: Mul.Mash.Tab.Ba.Gal.Gal is a hand-animated underwater 2D action game, inspired by Pong and Breakout. Control two paddles, one on each side of the screen, to deflect bouncing energy balls into enemies.

name: Music Thief
summary: Music Thief is a top-down shooter where you need to destroy all the benchmarks on the spot. Your house is your fortress, clear it of thieves. Each one threatens your image as a musician. The traps in the next house have already worked, they can hurt you, dodge and shoot all the benchmarks.

name: Muzegate
summary: Muzegate is a virtual concert application with sensational techno and EDM music, vivid lightshows, DJ view and 3 original environments. Ideal for virtual reality, but PC support is also included.

name: Mutus Meteora
summary: A virtual gallery where players can explore the highlands, its architecture, discover works of art, collectibles, interact with a third-person character, and adjust the time of day.

name: Multicellular
summary: Multicellular will take you back in time, to the dawn of life. Build your multicellular organism and combat hunger, the environment, darkness and other organisms. Everything in this new world can kill you, will you be able to survive?

name: Muri: Wildwoods
summary: Explore the mysterious creature-filled Wildwoods as a Muri. Find secrets, solve puzzles, befriend creatures, and clean away the corruption. Restore the world's beauty in this cozy adventure!

name: Murdertrain a comin`
summary: Arcade, puzzle, road rage

name: Multiplication: The Game
summary:
Are you tired of motivating your child to learn multiplication tables? Then let’s play Multiplication - the game!
In this game, multiplication tables are practiced and consolidated in a playful way. The high score hunt provides motivation to keep practicing.

name: Murder at Mystic High
summary: Cute visual novel murder mystery game

name: Muse & Barbarian
summary: This is a combination of third-person and first-person shooter game. As a warrior, you should break through seven stages to rescue Valkyries from demonic control.

name: MultiDimensional 4-in-a-row
summary: Whether you just want to play a classic game with friends, or want to crank it up a few notches to play in higher dimensions, this game will let you play local Vs or online against friends or strangers.

name: Mud Warriors
summary:
The black gate at the east end of the schoolyard is closed, locked. The After School Program does not relinquish its warriors willingly.

Here is where the mud is thinnest on the ground, and in some places the painted lines of the kickball diamond are visible.

A text adventure by Ryan Veeder.

name: Musi-Chance
summary: Musi-Chance! The game where musical instruments come to life, and jamming out is the norm!(also people trying to kill/befriend you and all that normal stuff).

name: Mu: Dark Epoch
summary: MU: Dark Epoch is a fantasy MMORPG mobile game that combines high quality, fast-paced gameplay, and innovative features. As the best MU Installment in the series by far, it offers impressive dynamic costumes and stunning graphic performance.

name: Mushoku Tensei: Game ni Nattemo Honki Dasu
Mushi no Idokoro
summary: Mushi no Idokoro is a puzzle game about insects in a fantasy world.

name: Muscle Car 3: Illegal Street
summary: Back in 2003, this game came out to try to cash in on the whole street racer fad at the time.

name: Munchees
summary: Munchees is a Pac-Man clone where you must move around a maze to clear it by eating all the dots. As you eat the dots you have to avoid ghosts and if you touch one then you lose one of three lives. There are power-pills that can be eaten and these allow you to eat the ghosts for a short time. You have a choice of how many ghosts on the maze (1-4).

name: Murder Mystery 2: Criminal Case
summary: You will continue the story and put your detective investigation skills to the ultimate test in Murder Mystery 2 – an immersive criminal investigator game. Starting in Los Angeles, you’ll use your skills of deduction to solve over 30 complex, mysterious criminal cases from multiple homicides to assassinations!

name: Must Deliver
summary: A top-down, retro styled endless runner.

name: MuSquare
summary: Hardcore twitch-arcade game, fully knotted on music.

name: Mushroom Heaven
summary: Mario suddenly finds himself as an angel in a lovely sky kingdom.

name: M.U.G.E.N
summary: MUGEN is a 2D fighting game engine developed by Elecbyte. Content is created by the community, and thousands of fighters, both original and from popular fiction, have been created.

name: Musical Studio
summary:
FREE FOR LIMITED TIME

Musical Studio is Where Colors Get Musical And Find Rhythm , is Where You Give Life To a Sound .
Every Color ,Every Spot is Different , Sounds Different And Feels Different And The Joy is , Easily You Can Control It All .

       ... Entertaining And Easy To Use For Kids …
 
                    Feel The Beat

                      Dj & Mix

                      Have Fun

name: Murder Is Game Over: The Blackinton Curse
summary: A new stand-alone murder mystery in the Murder Is Game Over series. Can you break the 150-year-old family curse before it claims another victim?

name: Murderous Intent
summary: Now might be a good time to quit the job, make your way to the city and get off of Mars.

name: Mucorales
summary: An enthralling RPG Maker horror game that explores a dark and twisted rendition of the classic fairy tale, Red Riding Hood.

name: Mush Rush: Stock Market Tycoon
summary:
Welcome to Shroom Land!
A stock market paradise waiting to be discovered! Play as Shroomy, a young mushroom who hopes to achieve financial freedom by investing in the psychedelic stock market. Equipped with several tools to make sound investment decisions, Shroomy ventures into the vast world of stock trading. With the loving support of his family and neighbours, Shroomy is destined for success in the market!

name: Multris
summary: The classic puzzle game that everyone knows but with a new twist. Watch as randomly generated polyominoes fall from the sky and attempt to organize them as best you can. Construct lines to score points and survive longer. Let the blocks reach the top of the screen and its GAME OVER!

name: Murder Dog IV
summary: The Murder Dog is on trial at the Hague for crimes against humanity. He stands charged with the killing of over 1500 people in a brutal attack encompassing the use of toxic gas, a fire engine and a blunt instrument. When these charges are put to the Murder Dog, his opening response is unrepentant and unambiguous: “My Taste For Bloodshed Remains Voluminous.”

name: Murder
summary:
Murder is a small game about becoming the next King by sneakily removing the current ruler stab-a-roo-style.

The game, disguised as a lighthearted and slapstick-fueled one-button-gimmick, subtly unfolds its core as an experimental contemplation about power, trust and mistrust and the infinite loop of greed and need as the player engages deeper in the daring loop of assassinations.

name: Music Composer
summary: An early music composition game released for the Atari 400 and 800, and one of the first applications which allowed users to create their own chiptunes.

name: Music Puzzle
summary:
You've never played a game like this one. Music Puzzle is a unique gaming experience, where you arrange songs from famous artists around the world. Each puzzle reflects a part of a song and contains various tracks representing different instruments.

Guitars, drums, voices or more exotic instruments like congas and the tambourine, it is your turn to listen to them carefully and sort them in the right order.
You can always listen to the original and compare it with your current progress. Use your ears and improve your hearing abilities to master the game. Different game modes and challenges will provide hours of gameplay with your favorite songs. Are you able to solve a puzzle with only a limited number of moves? Can you achieve the blind modes?

name: Music on: Acoustic Guitar
summary: A music game for DSiWare

name: Mushroom Challenge
summary: A mushroom hunter simulator. Here you can walk around the forest and enjoy the nature, meet different animals and, of course, gather mushrooms.

name: Mute Crimson
summary: Simple, but brutal XBLIG Ninja platformer.

name: Mushroom Musical
summary: A colorful rhythm platformer game.

name: Mudness Offroad 2
summary: Unleash Your Off-Road Passion and Leave Rivals in Your Dust!

name: Murica
summary: Get portal-napped to an alternate version of The United States 2000 years in the future. Travel the 16-bit landscape of MURICA on a search for the way home; and maybe save the past while you're at it.

name: Mutual Assured Destruction Simulator
summary: A short and surreal dark comedy-horror narrative game.

name: Mughaan
summary: Explore far and near in the world of Mughaan while battling or sneaking past the divine beings. In an event driven environment, with a complete day and night cycle, the enemies act differently depending on the time of the day. Find your way towards your goal or change the narrative as you desire.

name: Mushroom Picker Simulator
summary: Mushroom Picker Simulator is a mushroom search and collection simulator that will involve you in hunting many different mushrooms growing in the wild. Collect mushrooms, enjoy walking in the forest, complete missions, improve your hut and your equipment.

name: Murder Scheme
summary: Get together with your friends for an exciting murder mystery game experience! With a group of up to 12, you'll have a blast testing your wits and strategy. Join now for fun!

name: Mula: The Cycle of Shadow
summary: Mula is the story of the protagonist Wave a survivor of the dark invasion on the land of Mula. Finds himself to be the next guardian that will prevent the invasion, at the cost of his existence. As it was always been done.

name: Multi Play Volleyball
summary: The player controls a national volleyball squad (i.e., Cuba, USA, Canada, Brazil) as the play controls the entire team using an overhead view. Since indoor volleyball is simulated instead of beach volleyball, all matches take place on hardwood.

name: Mugged
summary: "Mugged" is a thrilling multiplayer PVP game set in a cartoon bank heist scenario. Players are split into Muggers and Police, each with distinct objectives. Muggers aim to stealthily steal the bank's gold, while Police strive to stop them.

name: Musical Zoo
summary: Musical Zoo is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Sega, which was released in 1995.

name: Murder by the Dozen
summary: You are a detective and have to solve one of 12 cases by interviewing witnesses, gathering evidence and analyzing lab reports.

name: Mutantity
summary: Trapped, hungry, and lost, a father longs to reunite with his family. Surrounded by cave walls and a flashlight, he limps forward determined to find his escape. His only obstacle is the mysterious monster lurking in the shadows...

name: Muppet RaceMania
summary: A racing game, in a similar vain to Mario Kart, using Jim Henson's Muppets as characters. It was developed by Traveller's Tales and published by Midway.

name: Muscle Memory Corruption
summary: Button Mashing Typing Game

name: Muscle Ranking GB: Chousensha ha Kimi da!
Multia Space Program
summary: Ever wanted to build a rocket out of junk? Well, now you can! This game exists in the same multiverse as Project Ultra and is in fact a prequel! A short adventure but hopefully a lot of fun!

name: Musicle
summary: You can play whatever you want from Youtube or your computer! This game will be quite difficult. You can challenge other player's score.

name: Mushroom Men: Rise of the Fungi
summary:
Mushroom Men: Rise of the Fungi on Nintendo DS is the prequel to Mushroom Men: Spore Wars on Wii. Play both to get the complete story! Mushroom Men gives players the opportunity to jump into the fantastic microcosm that is the backyard battlefield. Take control of the crusade, creating devastating weapons from everyday items and teaming up with other sentient plant forms that'll leave the enemy sliced and diced. Let the stylus be your rapier and the Wii Remote your bazooka as you cut down the multitude of household pests that threaten our very existence.

Mushroom Men inhabit the world that goes on while we humans are looking the other way, in the twilight hours when we sleep. We tower above them and go about our business completely unaware of the war waged at our feet. After the comet had passed, the scientists concluded that the strange, green dust had no effect on the world. No one noticed that tiny plants and fungi were acting strangely.

Mushrooms, cacti, flowers and vines had awakened to full consciousness. Tribes quickly formed, building plant and fungi nations and with nation building… came war! Mushroom Men shows gamers the mundane world from the surreal perspective of a three inch high Mushroom Man. As a brave Bolete Mushroom, players can wreak havoc on their enemies by transforming common household trinkets and trash into weapons and tools.

name: MultiBall
summary: Hardcore game with 4 different game modes that switch every level.

name: Mutant Storm: Reloaded
summary: Mutant Storm progresses over 89 levels of twin-stick shooter mayhem! As you get deeper, you are ever more overcrowded with nasty beasties. This carnival of frenetic fun is showcased in a cutting edge graphics extravaganza.

name: Mummy Candies
summary: Mummy Candies – this is a great game with very beautiful graphics and music.

name: Multiplayer Wizards
summary: Multiplayer Wizards - Bad Dudes are attacking the magic school. You and Your wizard student friends must take out ALL Evil creatures and Save the day.

name: Mugen Abisu
summary: Try to dodge the traps on our endless platform game. Slash the enemies to get more points. The dungeon is getting darker and harder in time so stay sharp!

name: Multigravity
summary: Change the direction of gravity to survive and navigate the Labyrinth.

name: Mudcraft
summary: A real-time strategy game, where players direct mud people in an attempt to build a flourishing village.

name: Muv-Luv VR
summary: Experience firsthand the hopeless fight of humanity against the BETA horde in the world of Muv-Luv.

name: Muyeon
summary: You have been invited to 6 days of detective event on an isolated island. Please enjoy the mystery adventure involving the stories of 8 people.

name: Mummy, mummy, mummy!
summary: Mummy, mummy, mummy! - a puzzle platformer game about mummies, made in 2D hand-drawn graphics.

name: Murder Mystery- Detective Investigation Story
summary: Put your detective investigation skills to the ultimate test in Murder Mystery – a realistic, immersive criminal investigator game. Starting in London you’ll use your skills of deduction to solve over 60 complex, mysterious criminal cases from multiple homicides to assassinations!

name: Muffin Fight
summary:
Muffin Fight is an arena-style, high action multiplayer game developed for Virtual Reality!

Get into the game, take on your friends, or play against strangers. Players can bake muffins using many different recipes to create many different effects, and the last player standing wins!

name: Mutsu: Water Looper Mutsu
summary: Mutsu: Water Looper Mutsu is a Simulation game, developed by Alpha Unit and published by Tomy Corporation, which was released in Japan in 2001.

name: Munch
summary: Help Munch become the biggest fish in the sea by grubbing your way up the food chain in a virtual reality where big eats small.

name: Musket & Artillery: American Revolutionary War
summary:
Musket & Artillery (American Revolutionary War) is a strategic style game specially developed for iPad users. It takes you back
to the days of the American Revolutionary War, where you can use military tactics to defeat your enemies (economic mode and war mode are available).
You can select to join any of the forces from British, France, United States, Hessen, Germany and Spain which are divided into 2 alliances
opposite to each other. You may increase your tax revenues by occupying the territory of your enemy, or you may occupy the enemy’s HQ to get
his entire territory. Absolutely, you can construct your territory to receive more taxes.

name: Muhammad Ali Heavyweight Boxing
summary: In career mode, the player can choose to fight as any of the game's 10 boxers. They start at rank 10 in the heavyweight division, and fight their way through all the others in order.

name: Musou Tourou
summary: A Nippon Ichi Software published strategy game released exclusively for the PlayStation Portable in Japan

name: Murder Machine Mini
summary: Wake up my little machine and try again. MURDER MACHINE MINI is a tactical FirstPersonShooter unlike any other. No cover, no autoaim, no instanthit, no handholding. A think - move - shoot game.

name: Murky Waters
summary: Collect resources, craft items, build a raft and roam the ocean. Team up with others, or fight and raid them. Survive as best as possible against hunger, thirst, AI, and players.

name: Murder Makes Strange Deadfellows
summary: A murder mystery set in a haunted mansion.

name: Muramasa Rebirth: Genroku Legends - A Spirited Seven Nights' Haunting
summary: The third of the Genroku Legends additional scenarios for Muramasa Rebirth. This add-on follows the story of Arashimaru, a ninja who is being hunted by his former clan. Worse yet, while fighting off an attack, he inadvertently desecrates the shrine of a powerful spirit who curses him; giving him only seven days left to live.

name: Multimaker
summary: Corporation "Omega" has developed a special test for the distribution of people by category. Can you pass the test and secure a bright future?

name: Murder Mystery: Who Killed Linda Neuman
summary: Murder Mystery: Who Killed Linda Neuman is an exciting and entertaining game developed by iWin Games. At the luxurious Paradise Island Resort, the Grand Fashion Show is just about ready to get underway. However, things come to an abrupt halt when the show’s top model, Linda, is found murdered in her room. The hotel manager is concerned with his hotel’s reputation and calls on the help of Detective Clara. However, as Detective Clara gets deeper into her investigation of the mysterious death of the famous model, she uncovers clues that lead her into a chaotic whirlwind of secrets and affairs. Just when she thinks she has found the perpetrator, she learns something else that takes her back to the drawing board. The plot thickens with each clue she finds!

name: Muddy Heights 2
summary:
Poop you way to victory...again!

In Muddy Heights 2, you play as a person who has had a little bit too much to eat and needs to relieve himself by any means possible. Poop off various heights onto people and vehicles to score points. Complete level goals to gain cash to buy more food.

name: Music Run: Hall of the Mountain King
summary: Music Run is a rhythm based, fast-paced arcade game. The music in this game is a classic by Edvard Grieg - In the Hall of the Mountain King.(Credits to Kevin MacLeod)

name: Music Inc
summary: Music Inc - a game that allows you to envelop yourself in the world of music production.

name: Multi Theft Auto
summary: Multi Theft Auto (MTA) is a multiplayer modification for the Microsoft Windows version of Rockstar North games Grand Theft Auto III, Grand Theft Auto: Vice City and Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas that adds online multiplayer functionality. For Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas, the mod also serves as a derivative engine to Rockstar's interpretation of RenderWare.

name: Mugen no Frontier: Super Robot Taisen OG Saga - Exceed
summary: Super Robot Taisen OG Saga: Endless Frontier Exceed is a crossover role-playing video game. Players take control of a party of characters drawn from multiple anime and video game franchises. Gameplay is divided between field navigation, dialogue sections between characters, and turn-based battles where players can expend action points to perform different moves.

name: Musical Chairs
summary: Musical Chairs is an online party game with audience participation features for Twitch streamers.

name: Mujina
summary: Mujina is a Maze Exploration game where the player has to activate 4 objective points and reach the end portal. Beware of the monsters and the numerous traps awaiting you! If everyone dies, it will result in a failure! Group up with your friends or anyone online to complete the 3 type of mazes!

name: Mujina: Maze Game VR
summary: Mujina is a Maze Exploration game where the player has to activate 4 objective points and reach the end portal. Beware of the monsters and the numerous traps awaiting you! If everyone dies, it will result in a failure! Group up with your friends to complete the 3 type of mazes!

name: Mugen Sweeper
summary: Evolved minesweeper. Infinitely zoomable board. Portal gimmick.

name: Multiplayer.Golf
summary: Multiplayer.Golf is a web-based multiplayer minigolf game, made from scratch in JavaScript. It features 20 playable holes, with more coming very soon.

name: Mushroom Pin
summary: Mushroom Pin is a relaxing but challenging puzzle game. You need to put the mushroom pins in the correct socket according to the rules of the levels.

name: Mugen Senshi Valis
summary: Will you be able to see the true last scene?!

name: Mummy's Curse
summary: You have to find the death mask of King Ruttatuttut which is said to be of pure gold and is guarded by a mummy.

name: Muramasa Rebirth: Genroku Legends - Fishy Tales of the Nekomata
summary: The first of the Genroku Legends additional scenarios for Muramasa Rebirth. This add-on follows the story of Okoi, who is possessed by Miike, a nekomata. Okoi avenges the death of her brother using her cat-like claws and demon powers to summon hordes of cat allies to battle alongside her.

name: Musketeer: Le Sang des Chevaliers
summary: A otome game by Otomate.

name: Murgles
summary: Monster catching, fantasy RPG with deep, strategic combat. Catch, level up and customize tanks, healers and damage dealers to become a powerful Murgle Summoner.

name: Music Awards Manager
summary: Always dreamed of creating your own music band? We will realize your dream! Record songs, release albums and manage group activities! With the advancement of the group, managers will help you, and you will also have to face more than one difficult choice. Compete for a place in the top 100! Conquer the whole world!

name: Mutant Monty
summary: You have to collect all the gold nuggets in the room displayed within a certain time limit in order to become rich and save the princess.

name: Mushiverse: Online Boardgame
summary: Mushiverse is an online board game that can be played with 4-6 friends. • It offers a unique experience with its diverse mechanics. • Each player starts the game with unique characters and aims to reach the targeted number of flags by navigating various risks and luck factors.

name: Multi-User Dungeon
summary: Multi-User Dungeon, or MUD (referred to as MUD1, to distinguish it from its successor, MUD2, and the MUD genre in general) is an early MUD and one of the oldest examples of a virtual world in existence.

name: Museum
summary: Museum is about a robot visiting a museum.

name: Mushroom Mountain
summary: Mushroom Mountain is a puzzle game for the PICO-8 console where players plant, destroy, grow, and spread mushrooms to control doors along a branching mountain trail.

name: Museum of War
summary: An epic slasher that takes you back to ancient Greece. Try yourself as a Spartan, defend your king and become a legend!

name: M.U.S.E.
summary: M.U.S.E. is a third person shooter game from Ayopa Games.

name: Mu Jiang
summary: "Mu Jiang" is a peaceful puzzle.It is free, but high-quality, original, and unique.

name: Museca
summary: Museca is a rhythm arcade game released December 10th, 2015 by Konami. The Museca cabinet features a foot pedal and five spinners, which can be pressed, held, or rotated in sync with the game's music. A key feature of this game are its Graficas, which are character illustrations that can give the player various bonuses.

name: Mutiny Island
summary: A 2D Pirate themed Survival RPG. Mutiny Island follows a young pirate's journey in reclaiming their ship and lost dignity. The primary objective is to defeat your mutinous first mate and reclaim your ship, The Red Dawn, by any means necessary.

name: Murazu
summary: Murazu is a platformer for the android AX-40-BM, whose planet was attacked and blown up. Now he has to travel through fragments from his native planet and take revenge on those who arranged this all.

name: Mutants
summary: In the distant future, human beings have outposts all over the galaxies, but wars and aggression have not died out. Neither has opposition to potential exploitation or environmental damage; your resistance movement has discovered that Macro-Genetic Mutoids (Mutants) are being bred purely to be used as weapons.

name: Mudkip's Dating Simulator 1+2
summary: On what appears to be an average day, Protagonist starts their first day at Pokémon High School. Shortly after, they meet new friends, and even a few love interests! But what is causing everyone to act aloof? Solve the mysterious... mystery(...?) of what's happening in this strange, strange plot...

name: Multiplayer Werewolves
summary: Multiplayer Werewolves - You and Your Team are the last remaining Humans on Earth. Can You Survive ?

name: Murder Party: Horror Hunt
summary: Murder Hunt is a multiplayer social deduction game. A group of friends spend the night in an abandoned mansion. Play as the killer and discreetly eliminate a list of guests, or choose the protector, charged to defend the group with his revolver!

name: Murder at the House
summary: 11 people trapped in an old abandoned house together. 8 Innocents. One Detective. One Murderer. You are either the murderer or detective. You must interrogate suspects and find clues in order to solve the mystery, before it is too late.

name: Munro's Tweetcarts
summary: 100+ tweetsized animations

name: MudGate
summary: Explore, survive, and make it home to build a kingdom! As a stranger to yourself in a foreign land, you must explore, improve, and most importantly survive in these unforgiving lands in order to make it home.

name: Mummy: Egyptian Puzzle
summary:
Help the Mummy collect all the keys of life (Ankh). Find the way to the Underworld.

Mummy: Egyptian Puzzle is a puzzle game for the NES. The game was created using Retro Puzzle Maker.

The game contains 40 levels of varying difficulty.

name: Mushroom Collection
summary: An RPG where a mushroom borrows the power of a witch for an adventure. It's a game that philosophizes what it means to be cute.

name: Music Drive
summary: Music Drive puts players in the shoes of Tina and Tunner in an adventure that combines car chases and intense shoot-outs.

name: Mugwump
summary:
Mugwump is an early video game where the user is tasked with finding four "Mugwumps" that are randomly hidden on a 10x10 grid. It is a text-based game written in BASIC.

The user enters a pair of single-digit co-ordinates in the range from 0 to 9 which are the x,y coordinates to scan. If a mugwump is at that location then the user is alerted. Otherwise the user is told the distance from the scanned coordinates to each of the mugwumps that are yet to be found. The game ends after ten turns or when all of the mugwumps have been found.

name: Muncell
summary: A simple puzzle game that completes color Munsell by overlapping colors. Use composition and anti-extinction to achieve a high score. Also check algorithmic interactions.

name: Mungyodance
summary: Mungyodance is the first game in the Mungyodance series. It is a rhythm game that features 167 songs, and has an overall simpler feel than the two succeeding games in the series.

name: Musical Balls
summary: Physics based music maker.

name: Mutant Mudds 2
summary: More mutants mudding around in stereoscopic 3D in this sequel to Mutant Mudds. Development has been put on hold.

name: Music Tower
summary:
Welcome to My Music Tower! Tap, Tap, Super Cute Piano Tycoon.
Play relaxing music with guitar and piano. It's simple but fun!
Decorate your tower with pretty & cute diorama brick items!
This game will heal your stressed mind comfortably.

You can play music easily just by tapping the tiles.

Build your lovely diorama brick tower.
You can decorate it anyway you would like.

- Lots of surprises to discover
- 20 awesome cars

Drifting an airport bus on a runway? That’s only one of the exciting things awaiting you here! Dive into a huge location with lots of cool stuff to do, discover a race track, an off-road area and more!

Throughout your adventure you will pop bubbles, discover toys, and become the ultimate hero of saving stars. Surrounded by all of the cookies, candy, fruit, and other treats Sweetopia is filled with, it’s no wonder Lemi always thinks with his stomach! name: Munchman II
summary:
Munchman II is a sequel to the original Munchman, Texas Instruments' own variant of Pac-Man. While the first game had the munchman laying down a chain throughout the maze, this game is more like a traditional Pac-Man game with the player having to eat all the chains. There are four enemies called hoonos attempting to kill the munchman but by eating an energizer it can for a short while go after and kill them. 
 
Some new features set the game apart from other Pac-Man games. The maze is made up of two interconnected screens that the player can move between through two doors. To complete a level the chains of both screens have to be eaten. Another feature is the teleporter that roam around the maze. By running into it the munchman is transported to the other screen. 
 
There are two modes of play: arcade and tournament. In the arcade mode the player has three lives and earns an extra one after every 10,000 points scored. In the tournament mode there is only one life and no extra ones can be earned.

name: Muhammad Ali Heavyweight Boxing
summary:
Muhammad Ali Heavyweight Boxing, as the name implies, is a boxing game featuring the three-time World Heavyweight Champion. The game display 2D sprite-drawn boxers in a 3D ring (the so-called "FreeCam" 3D system), with the boxers moving around the ring in 360°.

One or two players can choose the number of rounds (up to 15), the round length (up to 5 minutes), the number of times a fighter must be taken down to be T.K.O. and the number of referee counts (up to 10). There are two game modes: exhibition (which can be played against the computer or one-on-one by two players) and the tournament mode (single player). Players can choose among nine fictional fighters plus Muhammad Ali himself.

There are two control types: arcade and simulation. In the arcade mode, the d-pad moves the boxer around, while the A button is used for jabs, the B button for defense and the C button for hard punches. In this mode, the game decides which of the boxer's arms will be used for each punch. In the simulation mode, the d-pad moves the player around. By holding the A button (for the left arm) or C button (for the right arm), the player can perform head jabs (by pressing up in the D pad), body jabs (by pressing down), body hooks (by pressing left) and body hooks (by pressing right). Holding the B button, the player can cover up (by pressing up), duck (by pressing down), sway left (by pressing left) and sway right (by pressing right). By pressing A and B together, the boxer performs an uppercut.

Each fighter has a power and a speed bar. As they get tired by fighting or get hurt, the bars decrease. The lower the bars, the slower or weaker the punches get, until the boxer is knocked down. By defending himself a boxer can regain power or speed. There's also a counter of punches landed at each side of the screen. If the fight ends with no winner, the judges decision is made by those numbers alone, regardless of how many times the fighters were taken down during the fight.

The game features digitized speech, including samples of Ali's voice.

Each player controls a monster and every monster is able to perform 3 different actions: Attack, Mock and Dodge. Attack beats Mock, Mock beats Dodge and Dodge beats Attack. The player who manages to KO all the rivals wins the combat!

summary: Square Enix's first 3D action title for mobile platforms is an original fast-paced adventure set in the world of the PlayStation 2 game, Musashi: Samurai Legend.

name: Musasabi
summary: Musasabi is a fast paced platform game where Risu the flying squirrel collects gems to defeat the evil Akujaku.

name: MurmAllmaus
summary: MurmALLmaus is a point-and-click adventure about the Murmous Mouse and your crazy journey through space on the way to your mice. Accompany them on their way and click through spaceships, department stores and alleys, but be careful: it gets cringe!

name: Mutation Madness
summary: Mutation Madness invites you to a thrilling virus-blasting challenge! Armed with your disinfectant gun, defeat waves of mutating viruses and save Cell City from the Madvirus outbreak! Upgrade your gun and use powerful items, while unraveling information about the virus.

name: Muv-Luv Unlimited: The Day After - Episode 01
summary: The epic saga of Muv-Luv Unlimited: The Day After continues! In the aftermath of Operation Babylon, only a few inhabitable places remain on Earth. Follow the Japanese survivors in Seattle as they struggle to rebuild their lives — and defend themselves from the BETA.

name: Mulletman and the Molemen
summary: It’s judgement day on the world of the Molemen, and the Wall of Fire is coming! Help Mulletman kick and headbutt the Molemen to safety.

name: Murder
summary: Are you ready for an adventure where you become a detective or a murderer in multiplayer? Become a detective or a murderer in Murder

name: Muv-Luv Supplement
summary: Muv-Luv Supplement is a fan disc of Muv-Luv and contains various things, like an after story of Muv-Luv Extra; a series of short stories focusing around one of the main heroines; and Muv-Luv Duelist, which is a trading card game.

name: Mupple
summary: A colorful and animated world starring sweet animals and 2D Platformer focused on obstacles and challenges seems to be a perfect mix for... Deadly traps, absurd challenges and an insane adventure. Help Bilbo on his quest to retrieve the fruits from the forest and return home

name: Mutant Fighter
summary: Warriors clash against each other in a series of "Death Matches" in a quest to claim the throne and become king or queen of all fighters.

name: Mutants & Zombies
summary: Mutants & Zombies is a first-person shooter (FPS). A zombie apocalypse has occurred in the world and the survivors have to hide in safe shelters. You have to take on the role of an ordinary tramp and try to survive in this harsh world! Explore dangerous locations, kill zombies and mutants

name: Muito, Muito Minimalista: FES
summary:
The most minimalist platformer ever created, now FES!
Venture into a simple and fun platform game with great challenges! Collect all the coins to unlock the next level!

name: Mucho Taco
summary:
Build and manage tasty taco restaurants and upgrade their production and operating hours.

With the guidance of Barbacoatl, an enigmatic taco connoisseur, find the ancient map that leads to a secret ritual ground. If a Tacologist were to complete this map and journey to this ancient place, then he would be able to harness the cosmic power of the Taco and bring even more tacos to the universe!

Stats and Achievements! Try to get all the achievements, and keep track of every taco you have ever made!

name: Murder Diaries
summary: Figure out what happened, explore fascinating yet almost surreal landscapes and enjoy the thrilling storytelling. Collect pieces of the story while freely floating through related environments and immerse yourself into an intriguing story filled with blood and murder unlike you have ever seen before

name: Musynx: Deluxe Edition
summary: Musynx is the next destination of choice for rhythm game fans to rock out and stretch their rhythmic fingers! The simple, organic game mechanics will put players to the test with rhythms and beats like no other. With multiple difficulty levels and a huge range of genres to choose from (pop, classical, trance, vocaloid, R&B, and more). Deluxe Edition includes all DLCs and future update songs!

name: Mutant Ops
summary: Mutant Ops is a low poly co-op shooter. Go in alone or with friends and survive endless waves of mutants and monsters.

name: Murder Diaries Series Bundle
summary: This bundle features the Murder Diaries Series - a pack of 3 story-driven flight exploration games. In each of the games you will experience an exciting murder story while exploring the landscapes and piecing together the overall story.

name: Mutation Phase
summary: Mutation Phase is a horror-shooter with a first-person view, which narrates the consequences of experiments with sound waves. You have to survive among hordes of mutants and get out of the danger zone.

name: Mushbits
summary: Click and drag to select a path for each bunny. Unite them with their like-colored mushrooms. Bunnies can only move on platforms of the same color, co-operate to find a way towards victory.

name: Mushroom Hunt
summary: An interactive fiction game in which you are tasked by Granny to go find mushrooms for today's soup. Explore the surrounding land and reach the endings!

name: Murder
summary: A isometric Clue-style game

name: Mushroots
summary: New RTS for everyone!

name: Murder She Wrote 2: Return to Cabot Cove
summary: Acclaimed mystery author Jessica Fletcher seems to find herself stumbling across more than her share of murder scenes, but her keen eye for detail, quick wits, and intuition make it even unluckier for the murderers! Based on the classic TV show of the same name, "Murder, She Wrote 2: Return to Cabot Cove" lets you work side by side with Jessica while solving three all-new cases in this gorgeous light adventure/hidden object game. Navigate through the lovely but lethal New England village of Cabot Cove to solve clever puzzles and ultimately discover whodunnit!

name: Multiverse Crush
summary: Multiverse Crush is a visual novel for adults where you have to save the Multiverse and help a bunch of cool girls along the way. They would be very grateful!

name: Multiplayer Survivors
summary: MULTIPLAYER SURVIVORS - a highly advanced multiplayer and single player RPG survival looter shooter game, packed with lots of great maps to explore.

name: Mushroom Kid's Big Grass Sword
summary: Play as a mushroom kid on a journey to save their village with a sword that grows! Meet wacky characters and wield the Blade of Grass: a magical sword you can use to scale walls and swing around danger. Watch as it grows to comical lengths and stop the bird that captured the mushroom people! ️

name: Museca 1+1/2
summary:
The second and final version of Museca, designed to bring a more traditional music game experience to the series.

Although the last update for the game was released in 2018, complete with removal of the network requirement, online support for the game is still ongoing, making it only one of two games in the Bemani franchise that has network support (for ranking and profiles) after end of support for the game.

name: Murray Mouse: Supercop
summary: Murray Mouse: Supercop for the C64

name: Multimind
summary: Multimind is a relaxing game that tests the player's ability to multitask. Players need to maintain the stability of multiple game items at the same time and try to persist as long as possible as the game difficulty increases.

name: Multiplayer Mongolians
summary: Multiplayer Mongolians - They attacked Your village, They killed Your family. Revenge is a dish best served ... Mongolian! (Multiplayer or Single Player)

name: Multi-Purpose Arcade Combat Simulator
summary: The Multi-Purpose Arcade Combat Simulator (or M.A.C.S.), was a shooting simulator developed for the U.S. Army as a cheap way to train shooting skills. It was a bit of a mystery until a couple of years ago when the rifle and and carts became available through Ebay.

name: Murder on the Island
summary: Murder on the Island is a Visual Novel story, which takes place on a beautiful tropical island, where one of the 14 vacationers found murdered. Paul Parker, the owner of the island has only one week to find out what happened on the first night.

name: Murder Gods Play Pachinko
summary:
A group of friends gathers in a remote house for the first time in two years.

This is the place where Kaya took his life. Tensions are high, to say the least.

The snowstorm isn't letting up. It appears they're trapped. The only company they have is each other.

Little do they know -- time isn't on their side.

He's on his way.

name: Mushroom Kingdom Meltdown
summary: This is a ROM hack of Super Mario World and the first in the Mushroom Kingdom Meltdown series. Your goal is to travel through different time periods and gather clues to the Mysterious Enemy's whereabouts to prevent him from destroying the Mushroom Kingdom with a nuclear bomb.

name: Murasaki no Honoo
summary: Murasaki no Honoo is an visual novel, developed and published by Idea Factory, which was released in Japan in 2008.

name: Multimedia Shinsho: Driving School - Futsu Menkyoka-hen
summary: This program is made to teach the player how to drive and to test them on the dos and don'ts of driving. This comes in the form of true or false questions in a limited time either during a simulated drive or during a driving school examination. Correct answers grant the player points on their driving license, while incorrect answers lose points and/or health in the case of the simulated drive.

name: Mutant Storm
summary: Mutant Storm Reloaded is a multi-directional shoot 'em up developed by PomPom Games. The game debuted as a launch title on the Xbox 360's Xbox Live Arcade service with updated graphics, sound, and gameplay over its Windows and Xbox predecessor, Mutant Storm.

name: Mutant Fighting Cup 2
summary: Evolve, mutate and train your monsters to win the monster championship in hard brutal turn-based strategy battles!

name: Muscle Princess
summary: Action - Visual Novel featuring muscled princesses!

name: Murder at Midnight
summary: A multiplayer murder-mystery party game where you play as a prey or a predator.

name: Music On: Drums
summary: The definitive beatbox for creating songs and rhythms!

name: Museum Mystery
summary: Museum Mystery is a deck-building, story-driven roguelite adventure where museum exhibits come to life, wreaking chaos. Explore halls from different eras, battle works of art, collect your own deck of artifacts, and solve the mystery!

name: Mutant Football League: Complete Bundle
summary: This is the ultimate bundle for the complete Mutant Football League collection and your ticket to the most outrageous, hilarious, and brutal parody of professional American football. 7-on-7 arcade-style, football extravaganza where bloodthirsty superstar players hit the gridiron to battle it out in the most violent game ever played!

name: Mushiking: King of the Beetles
summary: An extremely popular Japanese arcade game where the player is awarded with collectible cards that are used in play--holds the record for most official tournaments for a video game.

name: Murder on Snake Road
summary: An Xbox Live Indie game developed by Silver Dollar Games.

name: Music Construction Set
summary: Compose and play a musical score using an easy graphical interface and toolkit. Use a pointer to drag notes, sharps, and other music nomenclature directly onto a staff, then play your creation. You can cut, copy, and paste entire sections of music, as well as print your masterpiece.

name: Multimirror
summary: Multimirror is a minimal grid-based puzzle game.

name: Must Reach
summary: Must Reach is a platformer in which you have to play as a schoolgirl who needs help finding books that will open the way to the next level. Destroy all monsters and go around all obstacles on your way.

name: Mujou no Erasmus: The Erasmus Two-Faced Stories
summary: Two original short stories told using characters and settings from The House in Fata Morgana.

name: Museum No.9
summary: Massive artifact collection! Build your museum with extreme freedom! Visitor revenue depends on your route design, and whether you can achieve perfect profits is entirely up to you! Enjoy light rogue-style adventure exploration, and use different skill combinations to battle monsters every time!

name: Mutant Football League: Dynasty Edition DLC Pack
Mushroom Tower Defense
summary: Magic Mushroom Defense is a creative tower defense game where players defend their castle against magical mushrooms in 200 unique maze-like levels. Strategically place and upgrade towers, adapt to evolving enemies, and overcome challenging obstacles to protect your kingdom.

name: Mungyodance Final
summary: Mungyodance Final is a cancelled forth entry in the Mungyodance series. The game was teased on Twitter by Emma Essex in 2013 and was later confirmed cancelled in a 2015 post on her Reddit.

name: Multiversus: Season 1 - Puns & Villainy
summary: The relaunch of Multiversus comes with a new season. Included are new cometics, maps, and characters such as The Joker, Jason Voorhees, and Banana Guard

name: Mudkip Adventures
summary: Mudkip Adventure is a homebrew game for the PlayStation Portable based on the Pokémon Mudkip.

name: Mushroom Guardian
summary:
The evil Frog King and his army are trying to steal the magic mushrooms! Aim, shoot, jump, roll and fly in this amazing action-packed, old-school platform adventure and restore the forest before the trail gets cold! The Village needs your best skills to succeed! Duty calls! Features: - 20 levels of fast-paced action! - Challenge a friend in the two-player Archery mini-game or play solo and test... 
 
your skills! - Unique combination of classic gameplay mechanics: Aim, shoot, jump, fly and roll! - Cheerful and amazing graphics! - Easy to learn, as modern endless runners! - Hard to master, like old retro platformers, a true blast from the past! - Epic Orchestral Soundtrack. - Achievements and Leaderboards!

name: Musicus!: Limited Edition
summary:
Musicus! is a port for the story-rich visual novel Musicus!, that tells a story of the struggle to fit society's mold while living for ourselves.

Musicus! Limited Edition includes the following:
- Musicus!
- B2 Tapestry
- Dr. Flower Maxi-Single "Vintage Memories"

name: Muv-Luv Unlimited: The Day After - Episode 02
summary: Muv Luv Unlimited: The Day After continues! The Shogun has come to Seattle, and with her, an installation that might solve the ongoing food crisis. But tensions simmer beneath the surface, as an unseen enemy waits for its chance to strike.

name: Muv-Luv Unlimited: The Day After - Episode 02 Remastered
summary: Muv Luv Unlimited: The Day After continues! The Shogun has come to Seattle, and with her, an installation that might solve the ongoing food crisis. But tensions simmer beneath the surface, as an unseen enemy waits for its chance to strike.

name: Mutant Herd
summary: You have to defend you HQ.

name: Muscle Ranking: Kimeru! Kiseki no Kanzen Seiha
summary: Muscle Ranking: Kimeru! Kiseki no Kanzen Seiha is a Sports game, developed by Jupiter Multimedia and published by Konami, which was released in Japan in 2001.

name: Mujintou Monogatari 4
summary: The fourth entry in KSS's Mujintou Monogatari series.

name: Murayaki Villain
summary: The very domination! Be the demon king who conquers the world! "Murayaki Villain"a village-burning, female-oriented, ♀ > ♂ Demon King Army training SLG

name: Musicus!
summary: Musicus! is a story-rich visual novel that tells a story of the struggle to fit society's mold while living for ourselves.

name: Mutant Football League: Werewolf Rampage Pack
summary:
Do you like big, friendly, furry animals? Well this is the wrong add-on for you!

In this add on for Mutant Football League, werewolves with a lust for blood jump into the action and eviscerate the competition!

This pack includes;
- Rampaging Werewolf Species: Unleash the hounds!
- Karcass City Creeps Team & Arena: One of the league's oldest franchises with an explosive offense led by their young quarterback, Hatrick McGnomes. Includes "Arrow in your head" home stadium.
- New Gorleans Zombies Team & Arena: Quarterback Drew Sleaze leads a Zombie offense with the league's most punishing running attack. Includes "Terror Dome" home stadium.
- 2 New Dirty Tricks: "Sticky Ball" puts an elastic substance on the ball making it impossible to hand off or pass and "Murder Ball" is a ball covered in blades that kills all defenders in the path of the throw

name: Murder Mystery Case 3: Who Killed Brett Penance - The Environmental Surfer
summary: Brett Penance was a good boy - a handsome popular honor student and champion surfer on his way to Standford University and a good life. Only now he can't make it. Now he's dead. If you've ever read a mystery or watched a detective on TV and thought "I could do that!" then here's your chance to solve three murders with your beautiful assistant , Lucie Fairwell. Interrogate the suspects on video, trace the victim's route and look at all the evidence. But hurry! You only have 6 hours to solve the murder or else the killer will get away.

name: Mutant Rampage: Bodyslam
summary: Civilization is in decay. Teams of bionic warriors rule the ravaged capitals of the world. But now a human challenge has been issued - YOU! Only you have the speed and skill to beat the mutants and triumph in MUTANT RAMPAGE! Face ten mutant teams in ten ravaged cities around the world. Expect to be taunted and teased by in-your-face foes in full-screen digital video animation.

name: Mushroom Season
summary: Mushroom Season is a mushroom picking simulator! Customize your character and immerse yourself in the competitive world of mushroom picking. Explore rich forests filled with diverse mushrooms—some delicious, some deadly. Master the art of identification, tackle survival challenges, and engage in fun side quests. Drive vehicles to cover more ground and aim for the prestigious mushroom picking trophy. Ready to prove you're the best forager out there? Dive in and find out!

name: Muse Dash: Hatsune Miku Collab DLC 2 - Rin·Len's Mirrorland
Muse Dash: Hatsune Miku Collab DLC - Miku in Museland
Multishop Tycoon Deluxe
summary: A simplified business model of food selling shop network. Do your best to become the great businessman in the city. Enjoy the game!

name: Music Escape
summary: Music Escape (Alpha Edition) is a VR rhythm game. You use your weapon of choice and escape the level by disarming music bombs and avoiding laser traps.

name: Musashi: Samurai Legend
summary: Musashi Samurai Legend marks the second chapter in the Musashi series. You'll play as Musashi, a young swordsman summoned to rescue a kidnapped princess. The journey, however, is a difficult one, as enemies of all types stand in your way. To survive the onslaught of foes, you must learn your opponents' techniques and use their attacks against them. Some techniques let you attack multiple enemies at once. Musashi Samurai Legend immerses you in a comic book-style adventure by combining Japanese animation with dialogue balloons.

name: Murder Mystery Case 4: Who Killed Taylor French - The Case of the Undressed Reporter
summary: Who killed Taylor French? Taylor French was a controversial young newspaper reporter with powerful friends... and enemies. The question is, which one wanted her dead? If you've ever read a mystery or watched a detective on TV and thought, "I could do that!" then here's your chance to solve three murders with the help of your beautiful assistant, Lucie Fairwell. Your job is to interview the suspects, check out their alibis, examine the autopsy report and investigate the scene of the crime. But hurry! You only have six hours to solve each crime. If you don't someone will get away with murder.

name: Munchkin Digital
summary: Kill the monsters & grab the loot in the classic card game!

name: Music 3000
summary:
MUSIC allows you to record vocals or other sounds to incorporate into your songs. Vocals can now be transformed into instruments, adding a new layer of creativity to the critically acclaimed music creation software. 
 
This US-version of the UK music phenomenon was not released under this title; instead, the game acquired a license and was released with a few changes as Funkmaster Flex's Digital Hitz Factory.

name: Mudkip Goes to Walmart then Dies
summary: Adventures in the Mudkip's Dating Simulator Universe continue in Mudkip Goes to Walmart then Dies! Return to the world of MDS set after the events of MDS1+2, the previous game. On September 13th, 2018, Mudkip is given a special task from Protagonist, and must carry it out with efficiency. How will Mudkip meet his demise? To whom will it be credited? Find out now!

name: Mutants from the Deep
summary: Mutants from the Deep is a submarine shooting game that mimic the technical limitations of the MSX1 computers. Choose your character, enhance your gear and fire your weapons in 8 directions as you swim into the dangers of the deep.

name: Muscle Girl Lisa: Training Diary
summary: "Muscle Girl Lisa: Training Diary" is a visual novel game that follows the story of Lisa, a cute girl from the United Kingdom who aspires to be a bodybuilder. Make the right choices to help Lisa grow her muscles and enjoy unique dates with her.

name: Music Power Up
summary: As a musician in the 1980s, create music for early video games. Make your own sounds and melodies from scratch, or use pre-composed patterns. Play games, upgrade the music app, meet programmers, editors and musicians, find your next music job, in the crazy decade that started the digital revolution.

name: Musashi no Ken: Tadaima Shugyou-chuu
summary:
Musashi no Ken: Tadaima Shugyou-chuu is a 1986 video game software developed and published by Taito exclusively in Japan. It is based on a Japanese sports manga series written and illustrated by Motoka Murakami that focuses on kendo, simply titled Musashi no Ken. The gameplay and design in the one-on-one fighting parts resemble Taito's other fighting game, Great Swordsman, especially its kendo mode.

The game's plot is about the son of two Kendo champions named Musashi. He strives to become as great at Kendo as his parents. The entire story centers around the world of Kendo and its up and coming competitors. The anime is broken up in to two parts. The first part follows Musashi's early years in grade school while the second part follows his high school years. In the first episode, Musashi befriends an Akita puppy who is by his side throughout the series.

name: Murder at the Birch Tree Theater
summary: Use deductive and abductive reasoning to uncover the truth behind a series of several unsettling deaths at a smalltown community theater. Uncover a narrative that spans decades by revealing the lies, petty grievances, and power struggles of people who came together to make art.

name: Musou Yuugi
summary: Musou Yuugi is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. The game seems to have a theme of Japanese folklore/theatre. It focuses on exploration and collection effects, but ornaments for Shirayuki's dream room can also be bought from the market sellers in certain worlds.

name: Mugen Souls Z
summary: Mugen Souls Z is a role-playing video game developed by Compile Heart as the second installment in the Mugen Souls series. The game plays very similar to the previous title but with a lot of fixes and plays a lot faster.

name: MultiMaze Party
summary: Chaotic mazes, cute animals, ruthless races. Anything goes in this completely wacky local multiplayer game !

name: MuMuMu: Mist of Six Dreams
summary: MuMuMu is a traditional Yume Nikki Fangame about exploring dream worlds.

name: Muscle Ninja VR
summary: This is a VR climbing action game with grip controls. Become a challenger of the muscle athletic show "Muscle Ninja" and conquer the steel demon castle! Your play can be streamed to an external monitor from a third-person perspective. Use your VRM model as your avatar and stream it!

name: Muhaboy
summary: Step into the shoes of Muhaboy! Dash and smash muha-s in this wild tactical beat 'em up, saving humanity from the looming Second Muha War! Battle it out with limited resources and adapt to the ever-changing chaos. Buzzopolis is waiting for its hero—time to show those muha-s who’s boss!

name: Murderwave: Digital Slaughter
summary: Mindless, addictive, slaughter. Mow down hordes of goofy customizable enemies with an array of fun weapons. Increase your MurderCount and unlock new weapons and levels as you play.

name: Music of Destiny: Corrupted Dungeons
summary: An ancient evil descends, and you will join the Crimson Knights to save the world! In this Roguelite game, assemble a team of knights and monsters, explore dungeons, collect gear, build defenses, and defeat dungeon monsters!

name: Multiplayer Ninjas
summary: Multiplayer Ninjas - The village is under attack, grab Your sword and go get 'em! (Multiplayer or Single Player)

name: Muscle Giants
summary: Action shooting to protect the world from giant machos.

name: Multiplayer Cowboys
summary:
The Town is being taken over by Ghosts. Can You and Your Posse Survive ?

This is a Fast Paced RPG Survival game.

The game includes a Single & Multiplayer CO-OP system via Steam.
You can Invite Your Steam Friends with the ' + ' Icon on the Main Menu and Team Up!

name: Murder Mystery J: Jinrou Judgment - Maru Icon
summary: You can use new faces for the "impersonation characters" that you use during battles. Only a set of 30 characters will be sold.

name: Murder Mystery J: Satsujinhan ha Soba ni iru
summary: Everyone is a suspect!? Up to 12 players can compete online! Using the communication function of your device, you can compete online with up to 12 players anytime, anywhere, with anyone, and as many times as you want!

summary: The stakes grow higher in this latest episode of Muv Luv Unlimited: The Day After! The shadow of nuclear annihilation looms over mankind, as France places the city of Seattle in the crosshairs. Can humanity overcome this crisis and unite to face the BETA?
